# Fireface Control

Totalmix replacement for RME's latter firewire interfaces 802 and UCX.

![https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/5261671/473997461-dc741105-b13a-45c1-ace4-1398f49cfb86.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..YRZTBweRjeDBzWXvC1mRDYV7TCbOvdHuQjc8N7l3RNM]()

**Requirements**

- Fireface 802 / UCX (firewire only, usb not supported)
- https://github.com/alsa-project/snd-firewire-ctl-services/
- https://github.com/jean-emmanuel/mentat
- https://github.com/jean-emmanuel/open-stage-control/


**Usage**

```
git clone https://github.com/jean-emmanuel/FirefaceControl
python FirefaceControl
```

**Notes**

Some settings made in Totalmix may conflict.

UCX has not been tested yet.
